title: Troubleshooting

body:
Issue Description In order to extend the battery life of their products, manufacturers destructively restrict apps background functions.
If the following error occurs frequently, it is probably caused by this reason.
  App automatically closes during background playback
  An error message shows: speech engine error or speech engine no response
  After the screen is off, the speech is paused or intermittently
  Solution Please visit dontkillmyapp.com for solutions.
Or searching [your device model] + "allow app to run in background" in the search engine.
Note: You will need change the battery optimization setting to allow both the T2S app and speech engine app to run in the background.
title: Manufacturers Restriction

body:
This issue has been resolved in the new version of Google speech service, please use latest version of Google speech service.
 If you previously uncheck automatic updates   Open play store page of Google Speech Service via this link, or search "Speech Services by Google" in Google Play.
  Re-check it
title: Issues with old version of the Google Speech Service

body:
Privacy Policy for T2S This Privacy Policy describes how and when the T2S application collects, processes, uses and shares data your information when you use the application.
By using the application services, you agree to provide consent to our collection, use and sharing of your information as described in this policy.
1 Data Collection and Use 1.1 For Improving User Experience For the purpose of improving user experience, fixing bugs and understanding how you use the application, this application collects the following information:
 Error information: General error information or program error stack, used to understand and fix errors. Device information: Such as device model, operating system version, system language, system memory usage. Performance information: Application launch time, frame generation time, power consumption, etc. Basic usage information: In order to know which functions users frequently use and whether they successfully complete an action. Speech engine information: In order to know which speech engine service used by users. Resettable device ID: In order to know if an error or operation was generated by same device. Geographical regions: In order to know which country or region users come from by IP address. Only be analyzed in aggregate.   These information is not linked to your personally identifiable and does not contain sensitive information. It only can and only will used for improving user experience.
 The app uses Google Analytics for Firebase and Firebase Crashlytics to collect these information.
1.2 Interest-Based Ads (Applicable for Free version users) The Google Mobile Ads SDK may collects and shares the following data types for interest-based ads, analytics, and fraud prevention purposes:
 IP address: May be used to estimate the general location of a device. How users interact with ads. Diagnostic information: Collects information related to the performance of your app and the SDK, including crash logs, app launch time, hang rate, and energy usage. Device and Account identifiers: Collects Android advertising (ad) ID, app set ID, and, if applicable, other identifiers related to signed-in accounts on the device.  Details
1.3 Transactional/ Billing Information Based on your purchase of a subscription or paid service, our payment gateway partner may collect information, including but not limited to, your credit/debit card details or other bank account details along with your billing address. This information is stored by the payment gateway partner. For instance, the Services will be using third party payment gateway partners to process and facilitate the payment of your subscription fee to the Services for providing you access to the subscription; such payment gateway partners are not controlled by us. When you visit such payment gateways you do so at your own risk. We encourage you to familiarize yourself with the privacy statements provided by such payment gateways prior to providing them with information about you or entering into any transactions with them. We do not assume any responsibility or liability for such payment gateways, the content of such payment gateways and their privacy practices, nor do we endorse them.
We may receive financial or transactional information (for e.g., transaction ID, etc.) from third party vendors in case of payments, for reconciliation and validation of transactions and also for the purpose of resolutions of complaints (in case of failed transactions and refunds).
1.4 Data Provided to Third-parties by User Actions While you are using the app, your actions may provide personal information to third-parties. This is not in our control, and you are responsible for it.
We recommend that you pay attention to the following situations.
1.4.1 Web Browser If you use the app's built-in web browser to visit third-party websites, the third-party websites may collect or share your personal information.
1.4.2 Speech Engine  The app uses third-parties speech engine (Text-to-speech) services that have been installed on your device. During your using the app, the app will submit text content (maybe from you typed, files you opened, or a web page you browsing) to third-party services to generate speech.
You should review the privacy policy of speech engine service you are using and only use speech engine services from providers you trust.
1.4.3 Save or Backup Data to Third-party Services If you choose to save/back-up your app data through a third-party service, the third-party service provider may collect or share your information.
1.5 Other Situations When you provide feedback(s), respond to surveys, or communicate with us, we may receive personal information from you, such as your name, e-mail ID, etc.
We uses a variety of third-party services to help provide our Services, including to host our various blogs and wikis and to help us understand the use of our Services. These third-party service providers may use cookies and other technologies to collect information about your use of our Services and other websites and services, including your IP address, device ID, pages viewed, and links clicked.
2 Developer Information and Contact T2S is developed by HE-SOFT, email: hesoft.developer@gmail.com
If you require any information or clarification regarding the use of your information or this privacy policy or grievances with respect to use of your information, please email us.
3 Changes to this Policy We may revise this Privacy Policy from time to time. The most current version of the policy will govern our use of your information.
By continuing to access or use the Services after those changes become effective, you agree to be bound by the revised Privacy Policy.
4 Agreement Effective The effective date of this policy is January 25, 2022, and only reflect the latest version of the app.

Terms of Service for T2S By downloading or using the our application service, these terms will automatically apply to you – you should make sure therefore that you read them carefully before using our service.
You must be at least 16 years old to use the Service. If you are aged 16 but under 18 years of age, you and your parent or guardian must review this Terms and the Privacy Policy together.
Privacy policy For information about the use of their personal data, Users must refer to the privacy policy which is hereby considered to be part of these Terms.
Forbidden use You're not allowed to:
 Reverse engineer, decompile, disassemble, modify or create derivative works based on this Application or any portion of it; Circumvent any technology used by this Application or its licensors to protect content accessible via it; Rent, lease or sublicense this Application;  Intellectual property rights All trademarks, nominal or figurative, and all other marks, trade names, service marks, word marks, illustrations, images, or logos that appear concerning this Application are, and remain, the exclusive property of the Owner or its licensors and are protected by the laws in force on trademarks and by related international treaties.
You have intellectual property rights in the creative content you make.
Warranty disclaimer We provide our services "As is" without any express or implied warranties, including the implied warranties of merchantability, fitness for a particular purpose, and non-infringement. For example, we don't make any warranties about the content or features of the services, including their accuracy, reliability, availability, or ability to meet your needs.
Third-party We is not responsible or liable for third party content or information, does not endorse material on any third-party web site and does not provide any warranty as to the quality, accuracy, source, merchantability, fitness for purpose or any other aspect of the content of those third party websites. If you have found anything on our service that you believe to be inappropriate or incorrect, please contact us.
Developer Information and Contact T2S is developed by HE-SOFT, email: hesoft.developer@gmail.com
Changes to This Terms We may update our Terms from time to time. Thus, you are advised to review this page periodically for any changes. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Terms on this page.
These terms are effective as of January 25, 2022

Let T2S read aloud text for you. Features   Open text/ePub/PDF files and read aloud it.
  Convert text into an audio file.
  With simple built-in browser: open your favorite website, let T2S read aloud for you.
  Type speak mode: A easy way to speak text your typed.
  Easy to use across apps:
  Use share feature from other apps to send text or URL to T2S to speak. For URL, the app can load and extract text of articles in web pages.
  On the Android 6+ devices, you can select text from other apps, then tap 'Speak' option from text selection menu to speak your selected text (* Require third-party apps to use standard system components).
  Copy-to-speak: Copy text or URL from other apps, then tap T2S's Floating speak button to speak copied content. You can turn on this feature in the app's settings.
title: T2S
